recipe.title: Cranberry Ketchup
ingredients: 3 1/2 cups fresh or frozen cranberries (not thawed; 1 lb)
1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons packed light brown sugar
instructions: Simmer onion in water in a 3- to 4-quart heavy saucepan, uncovered, until tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Add cranberries and zest and simmer, uncovered, until berries are collapsed, about 10 minutes. Discard zest. Purée berries in a food processor, then force through a large sieve into saucepan and discard solids.
Stir in sugars, five-spice powder, and salt and simmer, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes, then cool completely.
